communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Colorado Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Organization Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Organization Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches done within the agency.

2. Network Audit in Flock.
The report should include data logged from the period of January 1, 2025, to the date this request is processed. Per Flock's documentation, the Network Audit is available within the Insights tab and is defined as searches of the organization’s Flock network by any agency in the Flock System.

Please provide the audit data in a structured format such as .csv, .xls, or another machine-readable database filetype.

3. Data Sharing
a. The names of agencies and organizations with which the Agency shares ALPR data.
b. The names of agencies and organizations from which the Agency receives ALPR data.
c. The names of agencies and organizations with which the Agency shares “hot list” information.
d. The names of agencies and organizations from which the Agency receives “hot list” information.

4. ALPR Locations: Please provide the precise location of each Flock Safety ALPR camera deployed and utilized by the Arapahoe County Sheriff's Office.

You may find that these requests result in a large number of files. These exports from the Flock system are standardized data formats that are inconsequential to redact. To remove private information, simply omit the "License Plate" column. Others have found that other agencies have had trouble with this until they realized they could do this.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Zephyrine Groves

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

All emails from Edward Salina to or from media between August 1st and September 20th, 2025, regarding school security. These would include but not be limited to NBC, FOX, CBS, NBC, Newsmax, MSNBC, NEW12, Newsday, NY Post.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Edward J Smith

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Copy of Drone as First Responder presentation shown to the Board of Police Commissioners on 2/10/26
2. Updated flight data that includes flight routes, flight time, responding calls, call outcomes, and whatever else is included in the data portal. As of right now, the data only goes to August 2025. Include data from July 2025 to the date this public records request is closed or this section of the request is fulfilled, whichever comes first. 
3. Data on arrests and detentions since program start. Call they are responding to and why the person/people were detained and arrested, their demographics (race, age): Data from the department: 84 arrests, 50 detentions.
4. Video recordings from drone flights that are not part of an investigatory record from Drone as First Responder. See: https://dronexl.co/2025/10/23/chula-vista-landmark-police-drone-case/

Please release on a rolling basis once they are cleared for public release.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott
